name: Spooky Pikachu

passive.name: Halloween Costume
passive.effect: If Pikachu has a Ghost Energy attached to it, treat it as a Ghost-type Pokemon as well as a Lightning-type Pokemon.

attacks.name: Spooky Seance
attacks.effect: Take a Lightning Energy from your discard and put it into your hand. If Pikachu has a Ghost Energy attached to it, you may take a Lightning-type Pokemon, too.

flavor: We're reaching levels of mimicry that shouldn't even be possible.
